mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rts_score WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY rts_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT r.rts_id as rtsId, r.patient_id as patientId, p.age as age, p.gender as gender, r.gcs_score as gcsScore, r.sbp_score as sbpScore, r.rr_score as rrScore, (r.gcs_score + r.sbp_score + r.rr_score) as totalScore FROM rts_score r LEFT JOIN patient p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY r.rts_id DESC LIMIT 1
